Class GenericObjectEditor.JTreePopupMenu

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPopupMenu
weka.gui.GenericObjectEditor.JTreePopupMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement
Enclosing class:
GenericObjectEditor
public class GenericObjectEditor.JTreePopupMenu
extends javax.swing.JPopupMenu
Creates a popup menu containing a tree that is aware of the screen dimensions.
See Also:
